price: Ku fita da yãƙi kunã mãsu sauƙãƙan kãyã da mãsu nauyi, kuma ku yi jihãdi da dũkiyõyinku da kuma rãyukanku a cikin hanyar Allah. Wancan ne mafi alhẽri a gare ku, idan kun kasance kunã sani.
arabic: ٱنفِرُواْ خِفَافٗا وَثِقَالٗا وَجَٰهِدُواْ بِأَمۡوَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنفُسِكُمۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: infirū khifāfan wathiqālan wajāhidū bi-amwālikum wa-anfusikum fī sabīli al-lahi dhālikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
